description: A scientist precariously descends stairs, laden with a box of test tubes, about to trip over a small toy car carelessly left on the step. Two colleagues observe from below, seemingly oblivious to the impending mishap. The juxtaposition of serious scientific work, represented by the test tubes and lab coats, with the domestic chaos of a toy car on the stairs creates an absurd scene. This suggests a chaotic or irresponsible approach behind their claimed achievements. The irony lies in their stated pride in "progress" despite the clear lack of control or safety depicted.
caption: And, as you shall soon observe, we are quite proud of our test tube baby progress.
